name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Stellar Phenomena
name_original: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Stellar Phenomena
description:
Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Stellar Phenomena is a strategy game developed by Ironclad Games. It came out on 07-11-2013. It was published by Stardock Entertainment. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Stellar Phenomena on PC.
